titleStmt.title: Meditations and vowes, diuine and morall: a third century. By Ioseph Hall.
Meditations and vowes divine and morall. Century 3
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Humfrey Lownes, for Iohn Porter,

notesStmt.note: In this edition B1r line 3 begins "we"; C3r line 1 ends "lightly".
Identified as part of STC 12680 at reel 1142:8.
Appears at reel 1142 and at reel 1853 (same copy filmed twice).
Reproductions of the original in Harvard University Library.
